001package Delaunay_Triangulation;
002
003import java.awt.BasicStroke;
004import java.awt.Color;
005import java.util.List;
006
007import ij.IJ;
008import ij.ImagePlus;
009import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
010import ij.gui.Overlay;
011import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
012import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
013import imagingbook.common.corners.Corner;
014import imagingbook.common.corners.HarrisCornerDetector;
015import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
016import imagingbook.common.geometry.delaunay.DelaunayTriangulation;
017import imagingbook.common.geometry.delaunay.Triangle;
018import imagingbook.common.ij.overlay.ColoredStroke;
019import imagingbook.common.ij.overlay.ShapeOverlayAdapter;
020
021
022/**
023 * This plugin runs the Harris corner detector on the current image, 
024 * applies Delaunay triangulation to the N strongest corners and displays
025 * the result as a vector overlay in a new image.
026 * 
027 * @author W. Burger
028 * @version 2022/06/25
029 * @see HarrisCornerDetector
030 * @see DelaunayTriangulation
031 */
032public class Delaunay_Demo implements PlugInFilter {
033        
034        private static int CornerCount = 0;                                     // number of corners to show (0 = show all)
035        private static boolean ShuffleCorners = true;   
036        
037        private static Color DelaunayColor = Color.green;       // color for graph edges
038        private static Color PointColor = Color.red;            // color for point markers
039        
040        private static double StrokeWidth = 0.25;
041        private static double PointRadius = 1.0;
042        
043        private static HarrisCornerDetector.Parameters params = new HarrisCornerDetector.Parameters();
044        
045
046        private ImagePlus im = null;
047        
048    public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus im) {
049        this.im = im;
050        return DOES_ALL + NO_CHANGES;
051    }
052    
053    public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
054        
055                if (!showDialog()) {
056                        return;
057                }
058                
059                HarrisCornerDetector cd = new HarrisCornerDetector(ip, params);
060                List<Corner> corners = cd.getCorners();
061
062                DelaunayTriangulation dt = DelaunayTriangulation.from(corners, ShuffleCorners);
063                
064                ImageProcessor cp = ip.convertToByteProcessor();
065                Overlay oly = makeOverlay(dt);
066
067                ImagePlus im2 = new ImagePlus(im.getShortTitle() + "-delaunay", cp);
068                im2.setOverlay(oly);
069                im2.show();
070    }
071    
072        private boolean showDialog() {
073                GenericDialog dlg = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
074                dlg.addNumericField("Corner score threshold", params.scoreThreshold, 0);
075                dlg.addCheckbox("Clean up corners", params.doCleanUp);
076                dlg.addNumericField("Corners to show (0 = show all)", CornerCount, 0);
077                dlg.addCheckbox("Shuffle corners", ShuffleCorners);
078                
079                dlg.showDialog();
080                if(dlg.wasCanceled())
081                        return false;   
082                
083                params.scoreThreshold = (int) dlg.getNextNumber();
084                params.doCleanUp = dlg.getNextBoolean();
085                CornerCount = (int) dlg.getNextNumber();
086                ShuffleCorners = dlg.getNextBoolean();
087                
088                if(dlg.invalidNumber() || !params.validate()) {
089                        IJ.error("Input Error", "Invalid input");
090                        return false;
091                }       
092                return true;
093        }
094        
095        // ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
096        
097        private Overlay makeOverlay(DelaunayTriangulation dt) {
098                List<Triangle> triangles = dt.getTriangles();
099                List<Pnt2d> allPoints = dt.getPoints();
100                
101                Overlay oly = new Overlay();
102                ShapeOverlayAdapter ola = new ShapeOverlayAdapter(oly);
103
104                // draw the triangles:
105                ColoredStroke triangleStroke = new ColoredStroke(StrokeWidth, DelaunayColor);
106                triangleStroke.setEndCap(BasicStroke.CAP_ROUND);
107                triangleStroke.setLineJoin(BasicStroke.JOIN_ROUND);
108                
109                ola.setStroke(triangleStroke);
110                for (Triangle trgl : triangles) {
111                         ola.addShape(trgl.getShape());
112                }
113                
114                // draw the vertices of the triangulation:
115                ColoredStroke pointStroke = new ColoredStroke(StrokeWidth, PointColor);
116                ola.setStroke(pointStroke);
117                for (Pnt2d p : allPoints) {
118                        // get original Pnt2d shape (not Corner shape)
119                        ola.addShape(Pnt2d.from(p).getShape(PointRadius));
120                }
121
122                return oly;
123        }
124        
125}
